summary: An ordinance relating to the employment of the King County Humane Society, as agent, under Ordinances Nos. 68044 and 70026; modifying the terms of such employment; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund for the use of said Society for the performance of police duties, as agent, and declaring the emergency therefor; abolishing two positions of Pound Attendant in the Police Department and revoking and recalling a Salary Item in the 1943 Budget of said Department, all in connection therewith.
